spatial_accuracy.notes: General orientation is correct. Doors are missing actual swings and appear as simple gaps. Window/Balcony openings are roughly placed but lack precise frame alignment with the technical drawing.

structural_fidelity.notes: Walls have consistent thickness, but some partitions (specifically around the kitchen and foyer) deviate from the primary layout. The utility area transition is simplified.

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture mapping is highly accurate to the reference floor plan, including the specific rug shapes and plant placements.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Excellent isometric projection, clean lighting, and professional clay-style render quality. Minimal geometry distortion.

detected_errors.description: Missing actual door hardware and visible frames indicated in the 2D plan.
Misplacement of the divider wall between the entrance foyer and the dining area.
Slight proportion distortion in the utility room/balcony width compared to the kitchen length.
Dining table orientation is slightly rotated compared to the strictly centered 2D representation.
